title: dhEva vidyadiraja
sahitya:
dEva vidyAdhirAja yOgIshvara dEshika sadA paripAhi mAm dayAkara

anupallavi

 kEvala parApara brahma bhAvanApara sEvaka janAvana catura vibudhOttara

caraNam

 tApasa vara tIrthapAda bhAsurAkAra tApasEtara nAnA nirmala guNAkAra 
tApa sangra kulahara tAraka sadAdhAra pApavidUra vana tulasI mauktikahAra
